name: Bird Go Up
description:
This is a game where you play as a Bird, and try to go as far up as you can. Made in ~11 hours for SIP Jam 2019.

Controls are Space to jump with WASD to aim the jump. To jump diagonally, use multiple directional keys - such as W + A to jump up-left.

The levels are randomly generated, but you will have the same one each time, to allow you to get better at the level with practice. To get a new level, just start the game over.

Credits:

  • This sky image - by Mohammed Tawsif Salam, used under a CC-BY-SA license.
  • The bird sprite - by Mantis, used under a CC0 license.
  • This glass tap sound effect - by zembacraftworks, used under a CC0 license.
  • Code, music, and all other assets in the game were done by me (Ashley).

Source code available here.
